content: this free pattern is available exclusively at leahmichelledesigns com 1 this sideways triangular garter stitch scarf is very similar to the totally triangular scarf 2 but is worked in a fingering weight yarn and includes a decorative edge it starts with 8 cast-on stitches increases to the middle and then decreases back down to 8 stitches it uses the kfb increase and the k2tog decrease the decorative edge is worked at the same time as the body of the scarf one skein of malabrigo sock is used and the sample is shown here in ochre any sock or fingering weight yarn may be used weigh the total amount of yarn before beginning and periodically throughout the increase section begin decreasing when half the yarn is left find these other free patterns at leahmichelledesigns com dappled shawl 3 blended shawl 4 truly triangular scarf 5 totally triangular scarf 6 sugar plum cowl 7 effortless slouch hat 8 bulky ribbed cowl 9 join the leah michelle designs ravelry group 10 for pattern support announcements promos and kals subscribe to the leah michelle designs newsletter 11 for pattern announcements and subscriber-only discounts 1 http //leahmichelledesigns com 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/totally-triangular-scarf 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dappled-shawl-3 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/blended-shawl 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/truly-triangular-scarf 6 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/totally-triangular-scarf 7 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sugar-plum-cowl-4 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/effortless-slouch 9 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bulky-ribbed-cowl-5 10 http //www ravelry com/groups/leah-michelle-designs 11 https //us3 list-manage com/subscribe u=e32de1565695fb08e29aa80f0&id=6d8f779113
